thread.title: Richard Sherman shows off impressive collection of other NFL stars' jerseys
thread.title_full: Richard Sherman shows off impressive collection of other NFL stars' jerseys

title: Richard Sherman shows off impressive collection of other NFL stars' jerseys
text:
Feb 25, 2017 at 5:28p ET 0Shares 
Richard Sherman has been at the forefront of the NFL’s unofficial adoption of soccer’s tradition of players exchanging jerseys, so he’s amassed quite the collection of gear from other football stars over the years. 
The Seattle Seahawks cornerback used a little bit of his offseason downtime to go through his closet recently and shared his spoils on Instagram on Saturday: A post shared by Richard Sherman (@rsherman25) on Feb 25, 2017 at 11:46am PST 
They’re all spectacular, to be sure. (My personal favorite is the Megatron jersey smack in the middle.) Yet out of all that great game-worn memorabilia, one imagines the Patriots attire in the bottom right has special meaning for Sherman. While it’s not the jersey the greatest quarterback of all time wore during Super Bowl XLIX, Sherman can still bust it out and pretend he’s reminiscing about that fateful game against New England any time he needs a little bit of extra motivation. 0
